item.title: Coupled climate data assimilation with CESM+DART
Inferring past ocean states from models + data
Studying ocean dynamics using the MITgcm adjoint and ECCO state estimate
item.description: Click here for an Ocean Sciences 2020 poster on this work

item.title: Tools for accelerating tracer simulations
item.description: Simulating ocean tracers is computationally expensive. New online extrapolation and preconditioning techniques allow us to estimate equilibria in a fraction of the time.

item.title: Uncertainty quantification in paleoclimatology
item.description: Using proxy data is like playing a game of ‘telephone’ with past climate – sometimes the information gets garbled. I am working to quantify errors arising from proxy sampling procedures.
